}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:33.800
    | text      = But then this next clip made me even more concerned that maybe this guy ain't cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
